document.full_text: u.s. health officials say last fall's outbreak of a stomach virus that swept through pro basketball teams sickened 21 players on 13 teams.
document.title: cdc: nba stomach bug outbreak affected 13 teams
lines_and_colors: u.s. health officials say last fall's outbreak of a stomach virus that swept through pro basketball teams sickened 21 players on 13 teams.
